thread.title: Flight MH17: Wave of sadness as relatives briefed on the doomed flight
thread.title_full: Flight MH17: Wave of sadness as relatives briefed on the doomed flight | News24

author: news24.com
title: Flight MH17: Wave of sadness as relatives briefed on the doomed flight
text:
Gilze-Rijen - Air crash investigators have concluded that Malaysia Airlines flight MH17 was shot down by a missile fired from rebel-held eastern Ukraine, sources close to the inquiry said on Tuesday, triggering a swift Russian denial.
The findings are likely to exacerbate the tensions between Russia and the West, as ties have strained over the Ukraine conflict and Moscow's entry into the Syrian war.
"It was a BUK missile that hit the left upper part of the cockpit," a visibly shaken relative, Robby Oehlers, told reporters, just after being briefed by Dutch officials in The Hague.
He said a wave of sadness had swept through the room as hundreds of relatives who lost loved ones were briefed by Tjibbe Joustra, the chairperson of the Dutch Safety Board.
